Text: Our new movie is being "shared" on The Pirate Bay. There's a serious discussion on our wall about if it's theft or not. Who knows if it's theft but its awesome that this torrent is now the #4 most leeched HD movie on TPB after MIB 3, Snow White and the Huntsmen & The Avengers! Those movies probably cost $200m each and we only spent $150k on ours! Suck it big studios, although hiring Whedon for the Avengers was brilliant.
The previous comment is from the SuicideGirls facebook page.
They even posted a link to this.
Love the fact that SG is embracing this instead of auto-hating and lawyering up or some shit.

SG is one of the best examples of an organization that gets it.  When you support them, they'll frame posts like this in a positive light.  It you download the film and dug it, go give them some love!  Stop by their shop and grab a shirt, some stickers, another film or sign up to become a member!  It's not to support hot tattooed and pierced women!
Wow, this is SO MUCH better than any of the other videos SG has ever released! Really a great video, thank you for sharing!
